name: Tree of Strife
description:
Fight to Defend Your Home!

CONTROL your army of Birds (and a squirrel) to fend off the onslaught of pests trying to invade your nest!

ROTATE around the tree in a unique spin on the tower defense genre.

SPEED is the name of the game! Don't get short sighted and lose track of the lanes on the back of the tree! 

MANAGE your money well and fend off the army of Ants, Spiders, and the leaders of the armies..
